title: The Secret History of Magic - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/16/18
itunes:title: The Secret History of Magic - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/16/18
description:
George Noory and magician and illusionist Jim Steinmeyer examine his research into the history of stage magicians, including Houdini, and explore why people continue to be amazed by magic tricks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
